## IKEA-RCrawler

```{r RCrawler}
library(httr)

url <- "https://ww8.ikea.com/ext/iplugins/en_US/data/local-stores/data.json"
res = GET(url)
res_json = content(res)
raw = (data.frame(do.call(rbind,res_json)))
```

## Show Results

```{r Table}
library(knitr)
kable(raw)
```
